mapper.update: update party set party.delok = 'y' where party.delok = 'n' and party.party_enddate < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, party.* from (select * from party where delok='n' order by party_no desc) party) where rnum >= ((#{page} - 1) * 8 + 1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 8)

select * from (select rownum rnum, party.* from (select * from party where delok='n' order by party_no desc) party) where party_address=#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rnum >= ((#{page} - 1) * 8 + 1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 8)
select * from (select rownum rnum, party.* from (select * from party where delok='y' order by party_no desc) party) where rnum >= ((#{page} - 1) * 8 + 1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 8)
select count(*) from party where delok = 'y'
select count(*) from party where delok = 'n'
select count(*) from party where party_address=#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delok = 'n'
mapper.update: update party set party_count = party_count + 1 where party_no = #{party_no}
update party set party_count = party_count - 1 where party_no = #{party_no}
mapper.select: select member_passwd from member where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.update: update party set party_address=#{party_address}, party_age=#{party_age}, party_gender=#{party_gender}, party_enddate=#{party_enddate}, party_subject=#{party_subject}, party_content=#{party_content}, party_max_count=#{party_max_count} where party_no=#{party_no}
